Package db.dao.util

Class DataAccessObject<T extends DataTransferObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.dao.util.DataAccessObject<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of entity which DAO will be built for
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppointmentsDAO, ContactsDAO, CountriesDAO, CustomersDAO, DivisionsDAO, UsersDAO
    public abstract class DataAccessObject<T extends DataTransferObject>
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic abstract class for DAO entity classes used in application
